summary: Traumatized after witnessing her jealous husband kill her adulterous lover and then himself, an unbalanced, nymphomaniac young woman finds herself stalked by an unknown assailant, but she cannot make anyone believe her desperate situation.
cast: Heather Graham|Lisa Zane|Paul Herman|Rustam Branaman|Kane Picoy|Jason Cairns|Max Perlich|Balthazar Getty|Don Calfa|Richard Lynch|Tom Bresnahan|Sal Landi|Carrie-Anne Moss|Danny Kuchuck|Peter Dobson|Rainer Judd|Apple Via|Justin Williams|Chad Einbinder|Jennifer Sommerfeld|Mickey Cottrell|Jason Oliver Lipsett|Jack McGee|Louis W. Waldon|Paul Ben-Victor|Patricia Place|Sherman Baylin|Lang Swanson|George Brandon|Chad McDonald|Sebastian Gutierrez|Greg Littlewood|Alex Sherwin|Susie McDonnell
title: Jugando a morir
